Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds great value for those looking for high-quality solutions in its category. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I would like to propose a special introductory offer for you. For a limited time, you can purchase this product for $100. This price reflects my confidence in the product's ability to meet your needs and surpass your expectations. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the superior quality firsthand. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with your purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
